metadata.name: Gilded Sorrow
metadata.description:
This portrait is currently chosen to represent the United States in the World Photographic Cup. 
The awards will be held in Rome May 2nd 2022.
It has received multiple awards and has been published in Professional Photographers of America.
It will also be published in the prestigious PPA Loan collection Book for 2022.

Story behind the creation

“Tears have the value of gold on the scales of the human Heart”
Gilded Sorrow came to mind after watching Paris Hilton’s documentary on YouTube. 
She has everything, yet still has experienced trauma in life that has caused tears to rain down her cheeks.
 
To some Gold represents wealth, to others it is sign of kings and queens.
The truth is, you may have all the gold in the world, but you will also have tears till you have satisfied the soul.
